Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-22869 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-25
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-22869 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-25. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 0.59.0-25, affected by CVE-2025-22869
